posts.text:
For Richard Nixon it was All the President's Men that was his undoing.
For Bill Clinton it was All the President's Women that was his undoing.
When the Epstein files get released will we find that for Donald Trump it was All the President's Young Girls that will be his undoing?
#Epstein #Trump

posts.text:
Because I’m red and I’m rich and entitled all of Texas is red so we need Byzantine district boundaries to force our neighbors to be red because we’re better than they are.

The irrational cannot be defeated with reason, Jesus is a Republican and #Trump is gods chosen pedophile. 

Now I get it.

posts.text:
Pure politics. #Trump and the #GOP would cheer if it were the #republicans walking out.
The #Democrats use their last weapon to stop abuse of power by the #Republican majority.
Gerrymandering should be a crime. It is a crime against democracy.
Wake up #Texas.
#GreggAbbott
